author: IGN
description: Watch the Reveal Trailer for Cut That Wire, a multiplayer social deduction party game developed by Waka Studio. Players will play mini-games to reveal the imposter among the group while having bombs strapped to their chests, ready to blow at any moment. Uncover the imposter before it’s too late in Cut That Wire, coming soon to PC (Steam).
title: Cut That Wire - Official Reveal Trailer

author: IGN
description: Watch the Release Date Trailer for Unpetrified: Echoes of Nature, a single-player narrative-driven adventure game developed by Dreamhunt Studio. Players will set out on a grand adventure with a stone Golem and a Fox to restore Nature. Discover the secrets from the past in Unpetrified: Echoes of Nature, launching on November 11 for PC (Steam).
title: Unpetrified: Echoes of Nature - Official Release Date Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Here's your look at the world of Heartopia in this trailer for the upcoming cozy life simulation game with a focus on customization. Heartopia will be available on PC and mobile in 2026.

Following the guidance of a mysterious Star Spirit, players arrive on a blissful island and take on the role of the town developer. Between enjoying the laid-back lifestyle and uncovering the hidden stories of the town and its residents, players will customize furniture, put together colourful outfits, and build their perfect home with seamless in-game support for User Generated Content.

Heartopia features six core hobbies for players to wind down with - Fishing, Gardening, Cat Care, Bug Catching, Birdwatching, and Cooking.
title: Heartopia - Official Gameplay Trailer

author: IGN
description: Here's your look at the S.A.N.D.Y. - Beach Cleaner announcement trailer for this upcoming cozy, narrative and dark game in which you clean oil off the beach, sort out trash and rescue animals. S.A.N.D.Y. - Beach Cleaner, which features relaxing cleanup combined with a horror atomsphere, will be available on PC (Steam).
title: S.A.N.D.Y. - Beach Cleaner - Official Announcement Trailer

author: IGN
description: Check out the trailer for Danganronpa 2x2, the new version of Danganronpa 2 coming to Nintendo Switch 2, Nintendo Switch, PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and Steam in 2026. Danganronpa 2x2 features an additional story with different victims and culprits.
title: Danganronpa 2x2 - Official Teaser Trailer
